label: 半臂
対訳語: A type of vest that served as an undergarment
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: A sleeveless or short-sleeved man's vest used in the Imperial Court as part of the official court costume. It was worn as an undergarment below ho or ao robes. From the Nara period through the beginning of the Heian period, hampi were frequently made of plain-weave silk.
